remarks: Transform a region of summation by using the converse operation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2014.)
statement:
fsumcnv.1 $e |- ( x = <. j , k >. -> B = D ) $.
fsumcnv.2 $e |- ( y = <. k , j >. -> C = D ) $.
fsumcnv.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fsumcnv.4 $e |- ( ph -> Rel A ) $.
fsumcnv.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
fsumcnv $p |- ( ph -> sum_ x e. A B = sum_ y e. `' A C ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B j k y $.
$d C j k x $.
$d D x y $.
$d ph x y $.
